title: (x) Hofbräuhaus Las Vegas - Adobe Garamond {Stephen}
content:
Hi friend , please can you help me id the font used for Las Vegas Nevada

Thanks

 [‹ (x) Numbers on the RC Car Tamiya Hotshot - Aquarius {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013718/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34707 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font resembling Cooper Black, appr. 2-3 years old, famous designer, can you help me remember the name? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013718/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34725 "Go to next forum topic")
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content: I’m not seeing your image, but if you mean the font used for the logo on [this page](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013718/http:/www.hofbrauhauslasvegas.com/), it’s [Adobe Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013718/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/adobe_garamond_semibold/&sample_text=LAS%20VEGAS&sample_size=74).
Yes, and the swashier one for the Flash images is [Bellevue](http://web.archive.org/web/20080210013718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/bellevue-be/regular/).
